description.value: Your prayers allow any @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-core.items.Item.Xk5tp3aasPNtk4zt]{Stealth (Rural)} Tests you make apply to an entire group travelling with you within Fellowship yards. The group may include both humanoids (@UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-core.items.Item.8slW8CJ2oVTxeQ6q]{Size} (Large) or smaller) and large animals, such as horses or cattle. Rustler’s Cloak can affect up to 10 humanoids and 20 @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-core.items.Item.8slW8CJ2oVTxeQ6q]{Size} (Large) animals per Fellowship Bonus. Smaller herd animals, like sheep or goats, count as half an animal for this purpose, and bigger humanoid creatures, like Ogres, count as two humanoids.
